keen-eyes.name: Keen Eyes
keen-eyes.description: You gain a +1 bonus to all Perception rolls.

fast-learner.name: Fast Learner
fast-learner.description: When you gain experience, you gain an additional 10% (rounded down).

lucky-break.name: Lucky Break
lucky-break.description: Once per session, you can reroll one failed skill check. Must take the second result.

well-connected.name: Well Connected
well-connected.description: You have a network of contacts. Choose one type of contact:

options.name: Informant
options.description: Someone who gathers street rumors and intelligence.

iron-stomach.name: Iron Stomach
iron-stomach.description: You are immune to common foodborne illnesses.

adaptive-mind.name: Adaptive Mind
adaptive-mind.description: You can reassign 1 point from any attribute to another once per long rest.
